item.description:
I've signed up for this event on 8/29 http://america.cry.or... CRY stands for Child Relief and You, which I seem to remember growing up in Mumbai.

Anyway, it's very reasonably priced (cheap actually compared to similar events), it's for a good cause (Indian that too!) and it should be fun, so come on out!

I'm new to this group and I would love to meet up with some of you on Sunday. I'll be there with my 6 y/o son, so come with or without kids
item.how_to_find_us: My cell phone and other details (like what I'm wearing!) will be sent to those who rsvp yes, the night before the event
item.name: CRY Walk/Run for Child Rights on Sunday 8/29
